dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.customer.bill.BillingPeriod
dataStructure.description:
A billing time period. It can be recurring (for example, a week, a month, a quarter of year, a year) or custom (in this case additional business entities to describe custom dates would be needed).

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: BillingPeriod

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that explains in detail the semantics of this component.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: name
child.description:
A short descriptive name such as "week", "month" and "quarter of a year".

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: name

child.name: customerBillingCycleSpecification
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association BillingCycleRecurrenceDescribedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: customerBillingCycleSpecification
